availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jan Wickersham. Father of George Wickersham, Martha A. Wickersham, William T. Wickersham, Elizabeth C. Wickersham, Jacob L. Wickersham, John C. Wickersham, Eliza M. Wickersham, and Lucy J. Wickersham. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 57-58.
Find A Grave, "Jesse Wickersham (January 7, 1812-September 12, 1887)," Memorial #10841719, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10841719 (accessed May 29, 2018).
